title: Buying MATIC, going to moooon!!!
description: Just bought the dip at an average of 0.85$, MATIC seems to be in a perfect position to buy. This is a swing trade, so it can take a few weeks to play out. I am looking at a 1.5$ target and beyond.

title: Buying MATIC, going to moooon!!!
description: That's a great find! Seems in a great position right now. Adding up in my favorites!

title: Buying MATIC, going to moooon!!!
description: There is a huge risk of breaking support at 0.78$, then it would be a bloodshed. Chances for upside movement right now seems slim right now. Sold my position today, don't wanna lose more!

title: Buying MATIC, going to moooon!!!
description: I am not seeing it going that low anytime soon actually haha

title: Beware of scams!
description: Lately I have been seeing people posting random coins here and telling people to buy them. But right now, a big correction is expected, you should not buy them right now. Just do DCA and you would be doing great right now.
